clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Mydriatic agent eye pupil dilatation for diagnosis of ophthalmic nerve lesions

incompatibilities.description: The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Caffeine
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Theophylline
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Dyphylline
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Pentoxifylline
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Mercaptopurine
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Aminophylline
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Oxtriphylline
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Theobromine
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Fenethylline
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with 8 azaguanine
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with 7 9 Dimethylguanine
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Xanthine
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with 7 Deazaguanine
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Guanine
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with 9 Methylguanine
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Peldesine
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Hypoxanthine
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with 9 Deazaguanine
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Propentofylline
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Valomaciclovir
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with 3 isobutyl 1 methyl 7H xanthine
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Uric acid
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Doxofylline
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with 6 O benzylguanine
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Lisofylline
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Lobucavir
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Cafedrine
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Theodrenaline
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Bamifylline
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Proxyphylline
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Acefylline
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Etamiphylline
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Pentifylline
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Bufylline
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Bromotheophylline
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Furafylline
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with 8 chlorotheophylline
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with PCS 499
The risk or severity of serotonin syndrome can be increased when Trazodone is combined with Hydroxyamphetamine
The therapeutic efficacy of Glyburide can be decreased when used in combination with Hydroxyamphetamine
The risk or severity of serotonin syndrome can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Escitalopram
The risk or severity of serotonin syndrome can be increased when Lasmiditan is combined with Hydroxyamphetamine
Hydroxyamphetamine may increase the sympathomimetic activities of Formoterol
The risk or severity of serotonin syndrome can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Tramadol
The risk or severity of serotonin syndrome can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Fluoxetine
The risk or severity of serotonin syndrome can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Fenfluramine
Acetazolamide may decrease the excretion rate of Hydroxyamphetamine which could result in a higher serum level
The risk or severity of serotonin syndrome can be increased when Hydroxyamphetamine is combined with Oliceridine
